name: I Am;
description:
"I Am;" is a short experience to help you think positively or at least increase awareness of your bad thoughts. This short experience was inspired by the mobile App "I Am; Daily Affirmations."

This an entry to Nokiajam4, I AM;'s aesthetics are inspired by the old Nokia 3310 (the most popular mobile phone in my country when I was young.) I didn't incorporate the theme UPGRADE in this, but I'll cheat think positive and say I did: "Upgrade your life!"

Controls:

* Only the title screen needs input for now. Any Key/Click/Touch will do.

Features:

* 1-Bit: Only the two nostalgic colors of the old Nokia phone.
* More than a dozen of Positive Thoughts to go through.
* No subscription plan: A common thing in Nokia3310's time. That's considered a feature nowadays.

Credits:

* @ahmadmanga: main design & development.
* Main font "Ark" by @somepx. The font was provided by Nokiajam Community Resources.

Future:

* This is a prototype. I have a vague plan for the future updates of "I Am;" including the addition of sound & some user control. Feel free to suggest features.
